ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk -in for Agromet Observer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 21, 2025, 15:47 IST
 Indian Council of Agricultural Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 21-Aug-2025 |  Andhra Pradesh |  Salary : 21,700 to 21,700




FOLLOW

The Acharya NG Ranga Agricultural University (ANGRAU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Agromet Observer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can also use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th can apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Andhra Pradesh.

ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Agromet Observer	01	12th

ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 21,700/- per month.
How to Apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Carry all the required documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

Office of the Associate Director of Research, Regional Agricultural Research Station, Tirupati.

Important Dates:

Starting date	14-08-2025
Closing date	22-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now

Eligible applicants can also use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the application deadline. Candidates who have completed their 12th may apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the Direct interview. The application dates have already begun.
If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Andhra Pradesh.
